txt.en: Anborn can be found at Estolad Lân in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should talk to Anborn at Estolad Lân.
Banám Lugaun can be found in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should scout Banám Lugaun.

'Again we meet, as I knew we would. Now that you are here to assist in the task that Faramir has bestowed upon me, I will share it with you. Listen well, my friend!\n\n'For many days I worked to keep South Ithilien safe, and I have not abandoned that task. Indeed, my work here has as its continuing aim the preservation of those lands. But I see now we may need to climb the very Mountains of Shadow in order to achieve this goal.'

'If you are not needed to retake the city at just this moment, I require someone to report to Estolad Lân. Anborn organizes much of our effort in the camp across the river. He must know what has transpired in Rath Dúath. Would you scout the Orc encampment across the river on your way to meeting with Anborn? We are still uncertain as to their purpose in Imlad Morgul. Travel swiftly, my friend.'
Damrod needs someone to report to Estolad Lân and brief Anborn on all that has been learned about Rath Dúath and Imlad Morgul.
Banám Lugaun is located strategically between Minas Morgul and Cirith Ungol
